net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry

类 EntityEntryBuilder<E extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.EntityEntryBuilder<E>
  • 类型参数:
    E - The entity type

    public final class EntityEntryBuilder<E extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    An entity registry entry builder.

      • entity

        @Nonnull
public final EntityEntryBuilder<E> entity(@Nonnull
                                                    java.lang.Class<? extends E> entity)
        Sets the class of the entity.

        Entities will be constructed using a constructor accepting World. If you wish to use your own factory, use factory(Function).

        参数:
        entity - The entity class
        返回:
        This builder
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If entity is null

public final EntityEntryBuilder<E> spawn(@Nonnull

                                                   @Nonnull
                                                   Biome... biomes)

        min - The minimum spawn count

      • build

        @Nonnull
public EntityEntry build()
        Create an entity entry based on the data in this builder.
        返回:
        The entity entry
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the entity class has not been provided
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the entity id has not been provided
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the entity name has not been provided
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If spawns have been provided for a non EntityLiving
        ReflectionHelper.UnknownConstructorException - If a factory has not been provided and entity does not have a constructor accepting World
